overview: Tom Masucci is a seasoned professional with over 10 years of start-up experience in the risk management industry. A sampling of products and services brought to market include enterprise security data warehouse (SDW), enterprise data classification, enterprise static code analysis, application threat modeling, third party vendor assessment, MSSP, multi-vendor front line support, security architecture and assessment, policy and procedure review, firewall, VPN, NAC and IPS. A brief list of accounts broken with new technology include Chevron, Oracle, PG&E, Kaiser, eBay, Qualcomm, Zions, Visa, Seagate, Webex (Now Cisco), E*Trade, Charles Schwab, Safeway, PetMart, Standard Insurance and First American. Prior to Zettaset, Tom lead the western region of several start-ups through acquisition, those include Ounce Labs (IBM), Siegeworks (Fishnet), Intruvert (McAfee) and OneSecure (NetScreen). During these ten years, he was elected Vice President of the Silicon Valley ISSA 2005-2007 and successfully won election for membership chairman in 2008. Heâ€™s also successfully built seminars on the use of Predictive Analytics for Fraud Mitigation, and the relationship between Risk Management and Litigation Readiness. Tom is a frequent speaker at security conferences, a respected leader amongst his peers, and a trusted advisor to his customers.

relationships.title: VP of Business Development and Sales
